data.eml:eml: Micronella najtae n. sp. (Collembola: Brachystomellidae), a new species from Tierra del Fuego with a key to the species Javier

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Javier I. Arbea (2017): Micronella najtae n. sp. (Collembola: Brachystomellidae), a new species from Tierra del Fuego with a key to the species Javier. Zoosystema 39 (1): 15-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.439804, URL: http://sciencepress.mnhn.fr/sites/default/files/articles/pdf/z2017n1a2.pdf
